short_description: Discover the Cocos (Keeling) Islands, an Australian territory in the Indian Ocean consisting of 27 coral islands. Experience pristine beaches, world-class diving, unique Malay culture, and the tranquil beauty of this remote tropical paradise.

health.tap_water_safety: Safe to drink - excellent water quality
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, restaurants, and stores

tipping.hotels: Tipping is not mandatory but appreciated for exceptional service
tipping.guides: 10-15% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: Tipping is not mandatory but 10% is appreciated for good service
tipping.taxis: Tipping is not expected but rounding up the fare is common

weather.title: The Cocos (Keeling) Islands have a tropical equatorial climate with warm temperatures year-round. The islands experience two distinct seasons: a dry season from May to November and a wet season from December to April, with consistent trade winds providing pleasant conditions.

when_to_visit.title: Dry Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Perfect weather with low humidity, minimal rainfall, and warm temperatures. Ideal for diving, snorkeling, beach activities, and outdoor adventures. Best time for exploring the islands and water sports

when_to_visit.title: Shoulder Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm temperatures with occasional brief showers. Still excellent weather for beach activities, water sports, and diving. Good time to visit with pleasant conditions

when_to_visit.title: Wet Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Higher humidity and more frequent rain showers. Still possible to enjoy activities between rain showers. Lower prices and fewer tourists, but be aware of weather conditions

weather.best_time: The best time to visit the Cocos (Keeling) Islands is during the dry season from May to November when the weather is perfect with low humidity, minimal rainfall, and ideal conditions for diving, snorkeling, beach activities, and outdoor adventures
